thread.title: Great service in a good location
thread.title_full: Great service in a good location - Review of Hilton Garden Inn New York/Tribeca, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Beachdeac
title: Great service in a good location
text: While in town for the ACC Tournament, we stayed here in Tribeca between Brooklyn and Uptown. Very close to subway. This is a standard HGI property, but the service was great. The folks on the front desk were extremely friendly and most helpful. From suggestions for restaurants to directions to getting car to the airport, they were on top of everything. The GM asked me twice if everything was OK with our stay. I'll be back.
